## isSquare() function

Tests if a matrix is square.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isSquare<S>(matrix: Matrix<S>): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  matrix | [Matrix](./vector.matrix.md)<!-- -->&lt;S&gt; | The matrix to check |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

`true` if `matrix` is square

## Remarks

A matrix is square if it has the same number of rows as columns.
